channel.title: Sqvrltastic Art Archive
channel.description: Hi, I'm sqvrltastic and I'm a digital artist. Welcome to my website! This is my main place for posting my artwork and sharing my thoughts.

item.title: Website update
item.description: I finally purchased a custom domain (sqvrltastic.art) with Porkbun! ü•≥üéâ I will keep the old free GitHub Pages domain working for a while as a fallback, but I will be replacing all my old links with the new ones and I encourage you to update any as well if you have any materials from my site linked, or if you are subscribed with RSS! This is my first time purchasing a domain so bear with me if I inadvertently break something!

description.p: Deep Rock Galactic fan art; Two characters, Driller and Scout, are depicted as looking in each other's eyes in a romantic way, with Driller grinning and Scout is visibly flustered. Driller is holding a C4 satchel.

item.title: Redraw of the Montengrin dignitaries selfie [artwork]

description.p: Redraw of the Montengrin dignitaries selfie photo from Vatican. Featuring (from left to right): a man in a sunglasses smilling, a woman with seductive gaze, a man with a disturbed expression on his face and an old man with a tired expression.

item.title: Deep Rock Galactic female roughneck driller dwarf concept [artwork]

description.p: Deep Rock Galactic fan art; concept idea for a female roughneck driller dwarf.

item.title: Website update
item.description: Added some new useful resource links in the ‚Äúcoding‚Äù and ‚Äúart‚Äù links sections. Added a ‚Äúskip to main‚Äù focusable skip link for accessibility.

item.title: I wish more artist had a personal website... [blog]
item.description: Rambly blog post about wishing for a more human, more enriching web for artists specifically.

description.p: Vermintide fan art; elf Kerillian holding a chicken saying "The hell is that? That is just my chicken, Kruber", with Kruber in the background with a mortified expression on his face saying "By Taal...".

item.title: Website update
item.description: Deleted and added some new links. Changed a bit the ‚Äúbuttons‚Äù page; also, I no longer allow hotlinking of my images. Added ‚Äúartwork‚Äù and ‚Äúblog‚Äù tags to RSS items so they are easier to filter out in case you want to. Implemented some minor code improvements regarding the way images are embedded on this website. All in all, nothing major, mostly just polishing work.

description.p: Legend of the Galactic Heroes fan art; portrait of Reinhard von Lohengramm.

item.title: Website update
item.description: Updated my ‚ÄúFull guide to RSS‚Äù; added a small section at the bottom about on how to make your RSS feed autodiscoverable. Additionally, added some cool new sites in the ‚Äúlinks‚Äù section. Oh and, you can now find the HUGO source files of this website on my GitHub, if you ever wondered how I made this site the way I did.

item.title: Website update
item.description: I completely remade the template for the RSS news feed and the site‚Äôs own updates feed. Well, mostly on the developer side, you yourself won‚Äôt see many differences. Basically I made a template in HUGO and automated it, whereas previously I would code it by hand, which was pretty tedious and prone to making mistakes. Make sure to clear your reader‚Äôs cache if you have any issues! Also, now every artwork has a small annotation below!

item.title: Kerillian drinking Leaf Lover's Special beer [artwork]

description.p: Vermintide fan art; elf Kerillian drinking Leaf Lover's Special beer (a reference to another co-op shooter game, Deep Rock Galactic).
Vermintide fan art; elf Kerillian with a thinking expresion on her face.
Vermintide fan art; Kerillian looking smug, redraw of that one screenshot of Asuka from the anime Evangelion.

item.title: Website update
item.description: Deleted two blog posts (I just didn‚Äôt like them, I feel like they were too low effort). Changed my whole gallery template in HUGO to make it fully automated. This shouldn‚Äôt affect anything too much for the end user though so you won‚Äôt see many changes. Fixed some broken links, changed some stuff, yada yada, the usual. Not worth mentioning here.

item.title: How to subscribe to this website ‚Äî a guide [blog]
item.description: A guide on how to subscribe with RSS to Sqvrltastic Art Archive to get updates when I post new content or update this site.

item.title: Website update
item.description: My PC is still broken‚Ä¶ (update: it‚Äôs fixed now). In the meantime, I rewrote and cleaned up a lot of CSS code on the website. For you this mostly means that there are some minor layout changes. Also, I added a big RSS feed button down in the footer section and a simple guide on how to subscribe to this website‚Äôs updates right there as well. So if you haven‚Äôt figured out how to do it already, hopefully how you will!

item.title: Website update
item.description: Minor website CSS changes! Just trying to make this website easier on the eyes. Also, I kept the main font being monospace, but now it will show as whatever default monospace font you have in your browser, not as Courier New like before. Additionally, updated coding resources links and added ‚ÄúImages: figcaption vs alt. text‚Äù link under accessibility section.

item.title: Website update
item.description: Crazy to think that January is already ending. But, in any case, in today‚Äôs update I added a whole new section to my website: ‚ÄúLinks‚Äù! I will be sharing other indie websites there, as well as resources that I find useful and just cool and funny stuff!

item.title: Markdown cheat sheet [blog]
item.description: Markdown is a lightweight markup language that lets you add formatting elements to plaintext documents. Its main advantage is readability and simple syntax.
